item.title: Docker Basics
item.description:
Docker Basics #

ğŸ–¥ï¸ “It Works on My Machine” and Other Challenges #

Imagine you’re an engineer working on a software project, and your code runs flawlessly on your machine. But as soon as your teammates try it, something breaks. Maybe it’s a missing library ğŸ“š, an incompatible runtime version ğŸ› ï¸, or an environment configuration mismatch âš™ï¸. These issues make sharing and deploying software across different systems a tedious and error-prone process. The infamous saying, “It works on my machine,” encapsulates this frustration perfectly. ğŸ™„
